name: Small Crystal
description:
Small Crystal is a fantasy roguelike adventure where you play as a hero on a mission to save the world. Explore forbidden lands, unlock new heroes with different abilities, use different weapons, activate different altars to kill powerful monsters.


In the world of Small Crystal, time went on as usual, until the undead began to attack the villages. You play as a hero who volunteered to travel through the deadly lands to destroy the evils of this world. Trouble will be waiting for you everywhere, but you need to save this world at any cost.


You are invited to play for different heroes with their own abilities. As you level up, your abilities become stronger. Kill monsters to level up. During the game, you will come across altars, using them you can strengthen yourself.


Move freely between 3 sub-areas in each biome. Different lands will have their own monsters. At the end of your biome there will be a boss. When passing the boss, you will get to new lands. You can also get into trouble along the way, but vice versa, something pleasant.
